text: Mariyu satyatiraskarulu: "Atani (muham'mad) pai, atani prabhuvu taraphu nundi edaina oka adbhuta sanketam enduku avatarimpa jeyabadaledu?" Ani antunnaru. Varito anu: "Niscayanga, allah tanu korina varini margabhrastuluga vadalutadu mariyu pascattapa padi ayana vaipunaku tirige variki sanmargam cuputadu
